issue.errorLine1:
<string name="changelogs_v1_0_0">Initial release
Added calendar to mark attendance status
Added per subject progress display
Added ability to add, remove and edit subjects
Added settings for customising user experience</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_1_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_1_0">Fixed some color values in color palette selection\nFixed some UI margins\nAdded prerelease build update checker</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_2_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_2_0">Improved color scheme in high contrast dark theme\nAdded what\'s new bottomsheet to show changelogs after an update\nCode optimisations</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_3_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_3_0">Added behavior settings to modify certain app behavior\nAdded option to remember the last viewed month\nAdded option to turn off attendance streak visuals in calendar</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_4_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1:
<string name="changelogs_v1_4_0">Switched some UI components to material expressive theme
Added option to make Monday as first day of the week in the Calendar
Added option to directly download the latest updated apk inside the app without the need to visit the Github repository
Fixed many UI inconsistencies</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_5_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_5_0">Added option to backup and restore app data locally\nLocalised hardcoded strings\nMinor ui improvements</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_5_1` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_5_1">Fixed an issue where restoring backup failed in some devices</string>

issue.message: The resource `R.string.changelogs_v1_6_0` appears to be unused
issue.errorLine1: <string name="changelogs_v1_6_0">Added notification alerts for various events like attendance reminder, missed attendance alert and notification alert when new version of the app is detected\nImproved the batch selection of subject cards in home screen with support to dismiss selection by back press\nFixed system bars colors in android 11 and below</string>
